column1:
mikemakesmusic,"2014-09-22T17:12:47.077Z","Home Run!","

Terrific kit.  And free with qualifying purchase?  YES PLEASE!
Box/Instructions
Simple build - play quality is great (it's a car!).

,TRUE,5,4,4,5,5 Odeinoichus","2016-08-01T23:13:48.9Z","Impressive Small Scale Set.","

Set #40109 Mini-Cooper: LEGO is a real fan of making miniature versions of some of their large scale vehicle builds like the Volkswagen Camper Van and this year’s impressive Mini-Cooper. This one was given free on LEGO S&H with qualifying purchases. Is it worth owning? Read on and find out.

column2: Lovely use of pieces to replicate larger build. Nice rare dark green parts included.

Finished model is awesome, seriously this thing is so much fun and has such wonderful detail for something at this scale. It’s so much fun to look at and play with and makes a great desk toy display. The lovely dark green colours used really make it pop and stand out.
Roof has some issues, 1 x 2 tile used to make the roof completely smooth sticks out and ruins the overall curved design and look of the model.
Doesn’t include micro-scaled picnic basket. Minor complaint, but it would have been an interesting build to see included if possible.

column1: Overall you can’t go wrong tracking this one down. You can add more rare dark green pieces to your parts list and the model’s not bad either. Strongly recommended and a really fun build.
